thread.title: BRIEF-Global International Credit Group's Unit & Co-Lenders‍ Enter Loan Agreement To Lend HK$100 Mln ​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Global International Credit Group's Unit & Co-Lenders‍ Enter Loan Agreement To Lend HK$100 Mln ​

organizations.name: brief-global international credit group's unit & co-lenders

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Global International Credit Group Ltd :
* UNIT AND CO-LENDERS‍ ENTERED INTO LOAN AGREEMENT TO LEND HK$100 MILLION ​
* ‍GICL WILL PROVIDE A LOAN IN AMOUNT OF HK$30 MILLION AND CO-LENDERS WILL PROVIDE LOANS IN AGGREGATE AMOUNT OF HK$70 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
